name: my-life-script
description: A personal diary app that turns entries into comic scripts using AI.

scripts.vercel-build: mkdir -p .vercel/output/static && cp -r public/* .vercel/output/static/ && mkdir -p .vercel/output/functions/api/generateScript.func && cp api/generateScript.cjs .vercel/output/functions/api/generateScript.func/index.cjs && cp package.json .vercel/output/functions/api/generateScript.func/package.json && cp node_modules .vercel/output/functions/api/generateScript.func/node_modules -r && echo '{"runtime":"nodejs18.x","handler":"index.cjs","maxDuration":60}' > .vercel/output/functions/api/generateScript.func/.vc-config.json
scripts.build: echo 'No default build command. Use npm run vercel-build for Vercel deployment.'

author: Your Name (Optional)
